result.html: Bhí fonn orm teacht anseoI felt like coming here.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fonn orm teaċt anseoI felt like coming here.

result.html: Bhí fonn troda airHe felt like fighting.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí fonn troda airHe felt like fighting.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ga: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.orig: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.html: Má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beiḋ fáilte roṁatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
